1 #include "masterslave/manipulation/trajectory/CircleTrajectory.h"
2 
3 #include "ros/ros.h"
4 
5 CircleTrajectory::CircleTrajectory(Eigen::Affine3d startPoint, Eigen::Vector3d RCM, double radius, double zCoord, double speed , double cycleTime)
6 {
7  radius_ = radius;
8  cycleTime_ = cycleTime;
9  currentPosition = startPoint;
10  speed_ = speed;
11  startPosition_ = startPoint;
12  startPositionTrajectory_ = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
13  startPositionTrajectory_.translate(RCM);
14  startPositionTrajectory_.translate(Eigen::Vector3d(radius_,0,zCoord-startPoint.translation().z()));
15  circleCenter = Eigen::Affine3d::Identity();
16  circleCenter.translate(RCM);
17  circleCenter.translate(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,zCoord-startPoint.translation().z()));
18 }
19 
20 Eigen::Affine3d CircleTrajectory::calculateNextPoint()
21 {
22  ROS_INFO_STREAM("startPosition: " << startPosition_.translation());
23  ROS_INFO_STREAM("startTrajectory: " << startPositionTrajectory_.translation());
24  ROS_INFO_STREAM("circleCentr: " << circleCenter.translation());
25  // Start movement to the start position from the current position
26  if(pathParameterStart_<=1)
27  {
28  currentPosition.translate((startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation())/Eigen::Vector3d(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*cycleTime_*speed_);
29  // 0 <= Path parameter <= 1
30  pathParameterStart_ += cycleTime_/Eigen::Vector3d(startPositionTrajectory_.translation()-startPosition_.translation()).norm()*speed_;
31  return currentPosition;
32  }
33  // current part of the translation
34  Eigen::Vector3d incrementVector = Eigen::Vector3d(radius_*cos(2*M_PI*pathParameter_),radius_*sin(2*M_PI*pathParameter_),0);
35  // translate around the circle center
36  currentPosition.translation() = circleCenter.translation() + incrementVector;
37  // path increment to control the speed out of rqt
38  pathIncrement = cycleTime_/(radius_*2*M_PI)*speed_;
39  pathParameter_ += pathIncrement;
40  if(pathParameter_>=1) pathParameter_-=1;
41  ROS_INFO_STREAM(currentPosition.translation());
42  return currentPosition;
43 }
